label: logicA:transport_en
steps: [1] If the main bridge is closed, then traffic is diverted via the ring road.
[2] If traffic is diverted via the ring road, then travel time increases.
[3] For every vehicle x, if x is a heavy vehicle, then x must use the freight lane.
[6] Traffic is diverted via the ring road. (from [1] and [5])
[8] T1 must use the freight lane. (from [3] and [4])
[9] Travel time increases and T1 must use the freight lane. (from [7] and [8])
